article_title: Former delegate Janis announces run for Stosch's Senate seat
article_text:

og.description: Bill Janis, a former Republican delegate from Henrico County, on Thursday announced he is seeking the GOP nomination for the Virginia Senate seat that retiring Sen. Walter A. Stosch, R-Henrico, will vacate at the end of the year.
og.title: Former delegate Janis announces run for Stosch's Senate seat

article_metadata.description: Bill Janis, a former Republican delegate from Henrico County, on Thursday announced he is seeking the GOP nomination for the Virginia Senate seat that retiring Sen. Walter A. Stosch, R-Henrico, will vacate at the end of the year.
